overview: At age 35, DDP attempted to become a wrestler, something everyone told him was impossible. After years of hard work, DDP ended his career a three-time WCW World Heavyweight Champion. Since exiting the ring, DDP is now known the world over for his DDP Yoga, a life-changing exercise tool. DDP has mentored both Scott Hall and Jake Roberts to sobriety.  A relentless worker with a passion for life, this is the true story of Diamond Dallas Page.
title: Diamond Dallas Page: Positively Living
